DOC.brief_summary: As general surgical intensive care unit big tertiary referral university Thailand 1,000 admissions/year . Recently , complicate perioperative care surgical patient accept high complication resource utilization . Good data registration need provide information quality improvement resource allocation . This prospective observational ( crosssectional ) study design register patient > 18 year admit ICUs 1 year explore adequacy ICUs service , resource utilization ( ICU length stay ventilator day ) , ICU complication adverse outcome /ICU readmission within 72 hour discharge ICU .
DOC.brief_title: Data Registry Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) Siamitra Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) Salad-Samung
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Surgical patient Written inform consent study Patient undergo cardiothoracic surgery , traumatic surgery , neurosurgery Not consent study
